attributes.action: honour John Smeaton with a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On Saturday 30th June 2007, an average man became a hero. This man was John Smeaton. Showing the courage and bravery of a lion, he put his own life in danger to save hundreds of innocent lives from two cowardly terrorists. This act deserves the proper recognition from Queen and Country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
